channel.title: Client Error
channel.description:
I downloaded this RSPS: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662648.0.html , everything works fine but whenever I open up the client, it says that it can not find "java".
Here is what it looks like: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2j3gs92.png[/img]
I updated everything with the newest version of JDK. I do not know why it is saying this. Please help!

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

Replace java with

or

Best I can do with the information you provided. If not it means you don’t have Java or it isn’t installed correctly/wrong path.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

Please post your run.bat and compiler.bat files up here. I think it may be due to it following a classpath in the run and compiler, one you don’t have set. This could certainly be your issue.

Read full topic
